decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The London Borough of Hounslow as the Local Planning Authority hereby certify that on 03/05/16, the proposal as shown on the drawing submitted on 04/02/16 and numbered A-A Stairs section, 6 ES15, 6PGFFAP15, 6PAP15, 6EAP15, Existing ground floor and first floor plan, 6EFRE15, 6EPRE15, B-B section and as verified on site was not lawful within the meaning of Section 191 and 192 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for the following reason:
The development fails to comply with the terms of Class B, Clauses B.1ei and clause B.2,B,I,bb of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 because the proposals fail to demonstrate a 20cm set up from all parts of the eaves and the proposals include a raised platform/balcony beyond the outrigger dormer.
description: Certificate of lawfulness for the erection of a rear roof extension incorporating two Juliet balconies and three front roof windows to the house.
